full_summary:
# Paramount New Building 25 Pre-Engineered Metal Building in Steveston, BC 
[Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)
--------------------------------------------------------

**Tender Reference:** PW-22-01013385
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Tender Identification Number:** 30003379a

**Project Overview:** Small Craft Harbours (SCH) is seeking a qualified contractor to design, fabricate, and install a pre-engineered steel building for warehouse and locker storage purposes in Steveston, Richmond, British Columbia.

**Project Details:**

* Building Size: Approximately 1,430 square meters
* Building Design: Pre-engineered steel building, 42.5 meters in length and 33.6 meters in width, with a typical perimeter wall height of 7.8 meters
* Site Location: Steveston, Richmond, BC
* Contract Duration: None provided

**Contracting Institution:**

* Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* Address: 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6

**Procurement Method:**

* Competitive, open bidding

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity and Delivery:**

* British Columbia

**Contractor Requirements:**

* Design structural systems according to building codes and standards
* Fabricate and install metal building frame, metal wall panels, metal roof panels, and accessories
* Provide reaction forces for each column for foundation design
* Supply and install exterior wall panels and roof sheathing
* Deliver and erect structure on new concrete shallow foundation (design and construction of foundation by others)
* Provide structural engineered sealed drawings by a BC licensed professional Engineer
* Provide structural inspection report or Schedule CB assurance of professional field review and compliance by a Registered Professional of Record upon completion of the building installation

**Tender Documents:**

* Tender notice: [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/11/7a50bf7e74e6c089cf443f5747f67102/30003379a_-_itt_-_building_25_pre-engineered_metal_building_in_steveston_bc_en.pdf)
* Attachment 1: Architectural plan [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/11/8f4e2b87f936
